message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the effects of toasting bread. When bread is toasted, the heat dehydrates it, causing it to become drier and harder. Option (A) is incorrect because toasting does not change the size of the bread. Option (B) is also incorrect because toasting does not change the length of the bread.
